_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

How a person is categorized as blamewort: How a person is blameworthy - when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are blameworthy
How a person is mostly blameworthy - when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are mostly blameworthy, but occasionally blameless
How a person is slightly blameworthy - when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are mostly blameless, but occasionally blameworthy
How a person is blameless - when a person does things by way of body, speech, and mind that are blameless
